name: Raging Concentration
text: When you are in the heat of rage, not even pain can break your concentration.
benefit: While in a bloodrage, you gain a bonus on concentration checks equal to the morale bonus granted to your Constitution by the bloodrage.
text_zh: 即使处于失控的边缘，你仍然能维持自己法术的集中，忽视创伤与混乱的影响。
benefit_zh: 在处于血怒状态下，你在专注检定上获得相当于你的血怒提供的体质加值数的加值。
